home.title: Welcome to my awesome website!

profile.profileDescription:
I am a Systems Analyst with experience in front-end and mobile development, specialized in frameworks such as VueJS, NuxtJS, Quasar, and Ionic Capacitor. I focus on creating modern, responsive, and high-quality solutions, emphasizing teamwork and delivering results that add value.

My career reflects my commitment to learning and professional growth, transitioning through different areas until establishing myself in systems development.

workExperience.workExperience1Description: Responsible for Front End development using VueJS, NuxtJS, Quasar, as well as supporting technologies like Material Design, Bootstrap, Sass; Mobile development with Ionic Capacitor, and version control using GitFlow and GitLab.
workExperience.workExperience2Description: Front End development using VueJS, NuxtJS, Quasar, as well as supporting technologies like Material Design, Bootstrap, Sass; Mobile development with Ionic Capacitor, and version control using GitFlow and GitLab.
workExperience.workExperience3Description: Provided services to the DASA client, maintaining the IT infrastructure with hardware and software support. During this period, I was pursuing my degree in Systems Analysis and Development and applied my knowledge in small support software.
workExperience.workExperience4Description: Continuing to serve the DASA client, where I had been working since 2012, I maintained strong performance in my role without limiting myself to it. I sought to improve my knowledge, applying my administrative background to enhance the IT processes I developed. I maintained good relationships with both the hiring company and the client.
workExperience.workExperience5Description: Due to my dedication in the administrative area of DASA, I was recommended to the IT department, an area in which I had a deep interest. There, I worked alongside the coordination team, combining my administrative knowledge with the technical IT skills I was beginning to develop.
workExperience.workExperience6Description: Worked as an administrative assistant, standing out for my discipline and initiative in improving processes within the department.

academicBackground.academicBackground1Course: Graduation in Systems Analysis and Development
academicBackground.academicBackground1Description: Focused on software development, systems analysis, and solving technological challenges, with an emphasis on modern practices and efficient solutions for the IT market.
academicBackground.academicBackground2Description: Comprehensive education in business management, strategic planning, and decision-making, with a focus on organizational efficiency and leadership development.
